entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 9:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
